SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT NAME,PrcName,D1.CardName AS Patient,d2.CardName as Penjamin,payer_type,personal_amount,payer_amount,total_amount,discharge_date,date_order,sync_id_api FROM SO_H H left join OPRC C ON H.patient_type = C.PrcCode LEFT JOIN OCRD D1 ON H.partner_id = D1.CardCode LEFT JOIN OCRD D2 ON H.payer_id = D2.CardCode where name = ':1'

SELECT billno,confirmation_date,b.CardName as penjamin,payer_type,personal_amount,payer_amount,receivables_amount,total_amount,reference_gabungbilling,'Done' FROM SO_bill a left join OCRD b on a.payer_id = b.CardCode WHERE state = 'done' and billno not in (SELECT billno FROM SO_BILL WHERE state = 'cancel') and admission_no = ':1' UNION ALL SELECT billno,confirmation_date,b.CardName as penjamin,payer_type,personal_amount,payer_amount,receivables_amount,total_amount,reference_gabungbilling,'Cancel' FROM SO_bill a left join OCRD b on a.payer_id = b.CardCode WHERE state = 'done' and billno in (SELECT billno FROM SO_BILL WHERE state = 'cancel') and Admission_no = ':1'

SELECT trans_type,facility_name,tglproses,edc_machine,total_collect,b.branch,docstatus,ErrorMessage FROM SO_CASH A LEFT JOIN DSC1 B ON A.bank_id = B.BankCode where admission_no = ':1' order by facility_name

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild(MlsTrans('Do want to force close document @1@ ?'),Trim({0,2}))

SQL_STMT_U.val: UPDATE SO_CASH SET DOCSTATUS = 'C' ,ErrorMessage = 'Close by+':2'+' WHERE FACILITY_NAME = ':1'

SELECT jenis,order_date,lob_group,name,product_uom_qty,UomName,price_unit,price_total,WhsName,type_line,cost_unit,cost_total FROM SO_D A LEFT JOIN OUOM B ON A.product_uom = B.UomEntry LEFT JOIN OWHS C ON A.location_id = C.WhsCode where order_id = ':1'
